item.title: Glossary & abbreviations
item.description: This is work in progress AFOV Apparent field of view - TODO Airy disk TODO Aperture TODO arcsec / arcmin Seconds of arc / minutes of arc - it is a unit of angle equal to: \[ 1\:arcmin = \frac{1}{60}\:degree \] \[ 1\:arcsec = \frac{1}{60}\:arcmin = \frac{1}{3600}\:degree \] Back-focus TODO Bias frame TODO Bortle Scale Nine level scale that qualifies night sky's brightness. It is used to measure light pollution. More info is available on Wikipedia
